experiences: I participated in the creation of an administrative website with an intuitive interface using React.JS. This platform connects with a Rest API.
I developed a mobile application for iOS and Android in Flutter, aimed at nutritionist clients. Their primary focus is creating custom bi-weekly menus
Made use of AWS technologies like Cognito, DynamoDB, AppSync and Lambda for development.
Implemented Sentry as an event handler for exhaustive error control in both the mobile application and the web platform.
I used Git Hub following good practices and agile methodologies for efficient and organized project management.
